channel.title: Compile Help
channel.description: Im Trying To Compile My Server And it's Saying Im having Problem's with my JDK but i have already updated my java

item.title: Compile Help
item.dc:creator: @karuto karuto
item.description:
@karuto wrote:

the best thing to do is change ure compiler to this it will help u no whats rong:
TAROKS COMPILER NO CREDITS FOR ME:

:: ::
:: This Compiler is under no licenses and may ::
:: be distributed freely. ::
:: ::
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit
[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Help
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

go into there character file, and change there rights to “2”, then save, but make sure they are loged off before you save. you dont have to compile for this

item.description:

i still need help with the compile part?..i cant even make people admin’s[br][size=1]Posted on: November 04, 2007, 06:30:57 PM[/size][hr]http://s222.photobucket.com/albums/dd11/Zamorak_Pix/?action=view&current=compilererror.jpg

item.title: Compile Help
item.dc:creator: @Darque_Star Darque Star
item.description:
@Darque_Star wrote:

ok edit the compile.bat and clear everything from it and put this in it

@echo off title Server Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

and for runserver.bat edit it and clear it and put this

@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

Read full topic
